hero_title.text: Hi, I'm Vanaj Moorthy. I'm an artist and programmer from New Delhi, and I enjoy graphic design, music, and programming. Currently a senior at The Shri Ram School, Moulsari, I am the design lead at Megabyte and a senior literary editor for the Editorial Board.

project_preview_description.text: Project Saans is an NGO I co-founded to help provide clean breathing air to the citizens of rural India.
The Girl Code is a programming oriented NGO I work for. I've been on their team as a developer, designer, animator and teacher for over a year.

The Tempest Audiobook Project is an audiobook version of Shakespeare's "The Tempest" and my friends and I decided to compile. This project was intended to help ISC students study for exams as "The Tempest" is a mandatory text.
The Orange Yak Company is a web-design firm I started to try to earn some extra money and learn as a programmer. It is currently in a nascent stage but is developing quickly.
